Returns the parameters the distribution has been constructed with.

@1@ Returns the ''a'' distribution parameter. It defines the minimum possibly generated value. The default value is {{c|0}}.

@2@ Returns the ''b'' distribution parameter. It defines the maximum possibly generated value. The default value is {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;IntType&gt;::max()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ The ''a'' distribution parameter.

@2@ The ''b'' distribution parameter.
